articles.author: Jon Martindale
articles.title: Boost Your Windows SSD Performance by up to 85% With This Server Driver Trick - extremetech.com
articles.description: It's almost as good as downloading more RAM.
articles.content: It's rare we get anything for free these days, especially in the realm of storage and memory. But an updated Windows Server driver has officially given Windows native NVMe SSD support, and some enter… [+1495 chars]
